topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54659b596368720f56080100#post_54659b596368720f56080100
So basically you're using trolling as a guise to as to use it as a mask of "lol I'm trolling you" instead cause you know your viewpoints are unpopular and thus are using trolling as a guise to get back at the people who oppose your viewpoints?

. . . This mentality is why I think actual trolling is dead; nowadays "trolling" just is a "fuck you for having a opinion I don't like" than actual pranking.  Why can't we just go back to the days when trolling meant pulling things like the Mountain Dew contest where people hijacked the poll and made the most popular mountain dew flavor name "hitler did nothing wrong"?  That was hilarious.

Now if you excuse me I have my fascist soda to drink:
!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/380/149/d85.jpg!
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

so its funny to piss them off

topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5465a2626368720bd4c60100#post_5465a2626368720bd4c60100
An antihero or antiheroine is a leading character in a story who, unlike a traditional hero, acts in an unheroic manner and lacks conventional heroic qualities such as idealism, courage and morality.

-Wikipedia
